name: Ivy and Blue
description:
Ivy and Blue follows the story of Ivy, owner of a small town flower shop.

In her most recent shipment of plants is...a doll?

Except it's breathing!

Follow their tale of struggles, differences and similarities, as well as inevitable change.

The Characters:

Ivy & Blue is a short, kinetic novel (i.e no choices, one ending) that follows the budding relationship between potential friends. 

Gameplay, depending on reading speed, could be from 30 minutes to an hour long. 

Credits:

Character Sprite Art + CGs, UI: aeestha from 2humanstudiowo

Background Art: Poofmush (Eline)

Programming: Michal from 2humanstudiowo

Logo and UI: Kirakana

Writing: Neeka

Editing: Counter

~

Neeka's Note: Thanks for your interest in our little game! Ivy and Blue has been sitting in my mind (and my folder) for far longer than I'd care to admit, so I'm beyond thrilled to share this story with you.

Despite being shorter in length as well as kinetic, I&B is important to me. I relate to Ivy--who--without perhaps even realizing it at first--had come to long for something meaningful in her life. 

The central theme(s) of I&B as well are very dear to me, so I hope I was able to get them across clearly. 

Everyone on the team did such a wonderful job--the game turned out far better than what I had first envisioned years ago, and certainly better than what I could have created on my own.

Thanks again for checking out Ivy and Blue, we all appreciate it!
